text: Hey there, I'm Mrrky the blacksmith. What do you want?

choices.choice: The chief said you had a blade for me.

dialog.text: So you too huh? Give a blade to everybody, FREE ! What a stupid order. There you go.

Now you have a blade, could you help me a bit ? I have to work overtime for those crappy swords, and my stock of fur is empty. I don't have to time to refill it that mean no armor for anybody! I need some rabbit fur, could you get some from me ? I can give you a better blade if you do that.
Yeah ! Could you get some for me ? You'll find rabbits west of here, they'll be good enough. I can reward you with a better blade !
What's your name again ? %T right? Well thank you %T ! Here, take this sword,

choices.choice: What do you have to sell ?

dialog.text: Well of course! Sure we can use anything you like as currency, but those humans only have eyes for gold.

Hah, you should see your face right now! Well.. Yeah ! But only with few of them in a small town named GoldSomething. They even name their town with that thing! Greedy freaks. Since the Great Lightning, we're able to understand them well enough... But when they see gold, everything gets clearer than never.
